languages.text: {n}Может, фонтан с амасеком и является для Тассеры верхом роскоши, но для вас, в совершенстве подстигше{mf|го|й} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}искусство светского пития{/d}, объемы выпивки выглядят скорее скромно.{/n}

{n}Perhaps a fountain of amasec is considered the height of luxury here on Thassera, but to you, one who has mastered the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}art of social libation{/d}, the amount of drink seems rather meagre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Может, фонтан с амасеком и является для Тассеры верхом роскоши, но для вас, в совершенстве подстигше{mf|го|й} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}искусство светского пития{/d}, объемы выпивки выглядят скорее скромно.{/n}

{n}Perhaps a fountain of amasec is considered the height of luxury here on Thassera, but to you, one who has mastered the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}art of social libation{/d}, the amount of drink seems rather meagre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}或许对塔瑟拉而言，艾玛赛克酒喷泉是无可媲美的奢侈品，但对你这种{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}精通社交与酒宴{/d}的人而言，这里的酒实在是太不够看了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Perhaps a fountain of amasec is considered the height of luxury here on Thassera, but to you, one who has mastered the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}art of social libation{/d}, the amount of drink seems rather meagre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}或许对塔瑟拉而言，艾玛赛克酒喷泉是无可媲美的奢侈品，但对你这种{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}精通社交与酒宴{/d}的人而言，这里的酒实在是太不够看了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}おそらくアマセックの噴水はここタッセーラでは贅沢の極みと考えられているのだろうが、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}社交飲酒の技法{/d}を習得したあなたにとって、酒の量はかなり少なく思える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Perhaps a fountain of amasec is considered the height of luxury here on Thassera, but to you, one who has mastered the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}art of social libation{/d}, the amount of drink seems rather meagre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}おそらくアマセックの噴水はここタッセーラでは贅沢の極みと考えられているのだろうが、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}社交飲酒の技法{/d}を習得したあなたにとって、酒の量はかなり少なく思える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Quizá aquí, en Thassera, una fuente de amasec se considere el mayor de los lujos, pero, para ti, que has dominado el {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}arte de la libación social{/d}, la cantidad de bebida parece bastante escasa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Perhaps a fountain of amasec is considered the height of luxury here on Thassera, but to you, one who has mastered the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}art of social libation{/d}, the amount of drink seems rather meagre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quizá aquí, en Thassera, una fuente de amasec se considere el mayor de los lujos, pero, para ti, que has dominado el {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}arte de la libación social{/d}, la cantidad de bebida parece bastante escasa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Möglicherweise gilt ein Amasec-Brunnen hier auf Thassera als höchster Luxus, aber du hast die {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}Kunst des Trinkens in Gesellschaft{/d} gemeistert und findest das Getränkeangebot ziemlich mager.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Perhaps a fountain of amasec is considered the height of luxury here on Thassera, but to you, one who has mastered the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}art of social libation{/d}, the amount of drink seems rather meagre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Möglicherweise gilt ein Amasec-Brunnen hier auf Thassera als höchster Luxus, aber du hast die {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}Kunst des Trinkens in Gesellschaft{/d} gemeistert und findest das Getränkeangebot ziemlich mager.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Amasek çeşmeleri, Thassera'da lüksün zirvesi sayılıyor olabilir ancak {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}sosyal ortamlarda içme sanatında{/d} ustalaşmış biri olan sen için sunulan içki miktarı fazlasıyla yetersiz gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Perhaps a fountain of amasec is considered the height of luxury here on Thassera, but to you, one who has mastered the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}art of social libation{/d}, the amount of drink seems rather meagre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Amasek çeşmeleri Thassera'da lüksün zirvesi sayılıyor olabilir ancak {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}sosyal ortamlarda içme sanatında{/d} ustalaşmış biri olan sen için sunulan içki miktarı fazlasıyla yetersiz gibi görünüyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ici, sur Thassera, une fontaine d'amasec représente peut-être le summum du luxe, mais pour quelqu'un qui comme vous maîtrise l'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}art des libations mondaines{/d}, la quantité de boisson mise à disposition des convives semble bien maigre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Perhaps a fountain of amasec is considered the height of luxury here on Thassera, but to you, one who has mastered the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}art of social libation{/d}, the amount of drink seems rather meagre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ici, sur Thassera, une fontaine d'amasec représente peut-être le summum du luxe, mais pour quelqu'un qui comme vous maîtrise l'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}art des libations mondaines{/d}, la quantité de boisson mise à disposition des convives semble bien maigre.{/n}
